iti78:2.1: “Dhātuso, bhikkhave, sattā sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti.
iti78:2.2: Hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti, kalyāṇādhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti.
iti78:3.1: Atītampi, bhikkhave, addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandiṃsu samiṃsu.
iti78:3.2: Hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandiṃsu samiṃsu, kalyāṇādhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandiṃsu samiṃsu.
iti78:4.1: Anāgatampi, bhikkhave, addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandissanti samessanti.
iti78:4.2: Hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandissanti samessanti, kalyāṇādhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandissanti samessanti.
iti78:5.1: Etarahipi, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti.
iti78:5.2: Hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti, kalyāṇādhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samentī”ti.
iti78:9.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
